content.detailedDescription: I was with my family driving out of las cruces, nm when my brother spotted a brownish-copper color beam from the lowest cloud to ground level. we all looked and it faded away in about 20-30 seconds. we then got started looking everywhere throughout our entire 2 hour drive across southern new mexico. we looked every direction, and sure enough, we counted over 40 beams that show down to earth. they appeared in every single direction at different times. after awhile, we noticed that they would only appear as if they were touching the mountains. there is alot of flat area in southern new mexico, with few mountains far from i-10. they would be perfectly shaped beams too. absolutely perfect. arrow straight, all the same color. they were pretty thick looking too. also there was about 30-40 jet streams in the area. not jets, but leftover streams from jets that lingered for awhile. when it's humid in the air, the jet streams last a long time. when it's dry, they disintegrate fast. it might be the other way around but i don't think so. you can look it up for yourself. if i'm wrong about the jet paths, sorry.  new mexico air is very dry, and those streams were everywhere... doesn't make sense. when we drove back 8 days later driving east on i-10, we saw the exact same beams appearing in the sky over the same areas. only mountains. we drive every year on i-10 around february and this is the only time we saw those beams. i filed a report last night on the sighting we saw out of deming, nm 2 days ago. i would just like to know what those beams were and why they were there. but the fun of ufo research is the mystery and questions, right? anyways, it was definitely not normal.
content.summary: Multiple beams hitting various mountains

content.detailedDescription: I did not put down the dates because the dates on the first game camera was not set correctly. there have been numerous pictures taken by different game cameras that i've put out that catch funny looking lights as well as fog like things we cannot understand. i first put out the camera to try and catch something that was getting chickens that were caged. i have pictures in my laptop of these funny looking lights. one is kinda like a small spinning object. i've kept 2 of these photos of the one that was spinning. there are pictures of streaking lights, one a mule is staring at. it was in the middle of the night. there are so many different types of things that seem to be going on. one night i called my boyfriend that was at his house at the noted address and ask him what he was doing and he said laying here in bed watching lights shoot out of what looks like a star. he said i was sure missing a light show. i hurried over to his house and saw the same thing happen only twice. he said it had been continuous before i arrived. i layer in bed starring at this star like thing that was above the tree line for over 2 hours and i finally went to sleep because it was just sitting there doing nothing. there is a security light near where this was happening and it was located above and to the west of the security light. there are no other lights where this thing was. the fields i filled out above describe not one sighting but this one plus all the other streaks of light we see on the game camera. there are several i have of a fog like object taken in the pen i had the game camera located in. i was still trying to catch whatever had been taking the chickens. i moved it around several times and seemed to always get something weird on it. one picture shows large  lights like something from way above is shining down on the area of his house, pens and shop, like four or five illuminating., like four or five fingers of light coming from the sky. i also have one picture that shows four lights or funny illuminating right in front of the camera between the chicken pens and the game camera. we have also seen an orb of some kind bouncing around in the bed of my new pickup truck when we parked and were checking out the pickup bed camera. seeing how it worked. it was dark, parked in front of his (boyfriends house) and stationary. this light basketball size object was in the bed of the pickup moving around then out of the pickup bed when he turned on the camera that shows the bed of the pickup���.We both freaked out as to what it was. i really don't know what all these things are that we've been catching on my game cameras but it doesn't  seem to matter what camera i put out it catches streaks of light and some appear to be coming from not only the side of the camera, across the field of view, but also from the ground up. one pic shows his mule looking at one of these streaks. the next picture shows the streak in a different place like these streaks of light are moving and are all around his place, in front yard, in the pens, etc���.He was working in his large shop one night and saw a flash of light and thought wow there's a thunderstorm coming up he thought it was lightening. then he walked out the door to see and one went right by him very fast. he was telling me about it and said not only do the cameras catch these funny things but i saw one in person. so���.There was only one time there was a stationary object that had shooting objects coming from it. the other times are ongoing that show light objects that my camera catches. the fog looking thing it took picture after picture of and i have them here on my laptop. i can send these to you as well as some of the other funny looking lights. i didn't have the dates written down so just filled in the above with any time. the camera i have on his front porch right now has the date and time set correctly. the pic's of light streaks on it will be correct. it is like we are in a vortex or whatever black hole or something where these things are happening because it is ongoing. i finally think it is time to share whatever is happening with you. game camera pictures. the below pictures on #2 and #3 have the correct time and date.  picture 6 i have numerous pictures taken in sequence til it is daylight and the last one the camera got was after it got light. i have many more pictures, still hunting one in particular.
content.summary: See unknown lights on game cameras. saw stationary star like object omitting lights shooting from it. camera catches fog like things all the time and streaks of light is ongoing.

content.detailedDescription: Cant spell good
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Orb

content.detailedDescription:
One night me and my brother are comming from super market. on on the way to home i speak with my brother about another ufo that i saw 4 days before. and ofcourse he don't belive me. i remeber i told him "i saw ufo, it's look like that star on the sky" and i point with my finger. as i do that a "star" or ufo starts to moving so fast and change direction left, right, up, down, zigzag and fly of in the sky so quick. my brother looked me and said "what was that?" and i told him "do you stell belive me?" "you just saw the ufo"
i'm soo lucky because my brother was with me to see what i saw. but after he seing that on the sky he still don't want to accep that. before that i saw ufo and i was alone. i don't tell enyone beceuse i know they won't belive me.
after seing a "star" i saw another ufo. it's hovering above ground about 200 meters away and i was not alone, two friend are being with me. when we start approaching to that big light(like car size) it's fly of to sky with amaizing speed. i know all this look like it's from a sc-fi movie, but i know what my brother, friend and i saw. i told them "i know and you guys know what you saw, but noone will beleve you.
sorry for my bad english :)
content.summary: My brother and i saw ufo!

content.detailedDescription: Girlfriend and i got out of our car to see a friend, we noticed a huge bright orb travelling east, the sky was clear, started recording with my sony handycam, it's a 70 x 2000 zoom handycam, it was travelling really fast, and hard to track with my camera but got what i couls. i copied the video andto my computer to watch it and used a photo program to bring out the shape of the object and got a few different shaped one's from it, there was another object in the video that my edge program brought that you will see. i was surprised that it was going so fast but it was still noticeable in the sky. we lost sight of the object because it got too far away to see.
content.summary: Visiting a friend in the north end of saint john, got out of the car and noticed a huge bright orb travelling fast towards the east from west direction, recordedfor over 2 minutes then it got too far away to record

content.detailedDescription: Today..Other person is witney..Cinco hacia el nortet dispararon un fuego hacia abajo q se paro en var���as paresluces www.Movimiento
content.summary: Five ligth move to north.. shut the fire toi earth

content.detailedDescription:
When i was younger (don't remember the exact age, somewhere around 12, 13 years old, it was somewhere between 1994-1996 or smth) i saw something which, for most of my life i thought was just a weird meteor, until recently when i saw a documentary that showed something similar and i was like...Wtf
anyway, back then, my parents being engineers and working at a hydro plant and dam that was being constructed, we lived for a part of my childhood near the construction site (i don't know the english word for the living quarters which are constructed specificaly for employees to live in) in the mountains, placed in a river valley surrounded on both sides by mountains, 
it was basically a mini-village built for the employees.
anyway, one evening i was on the football field with my brother and 4 (i think) others, we just finished playing because it got dark and we were just passing the ball around to each other. i remember i turned to get the ball and then we saw a...Thing, well, a tear shaped green object with a bright green round core that fell behind the mountain, at an angle of about 45deg from horizontal. it fell from my left to my right, so from where i was standing, aproximately from northwest to north.
after it dissapeared behind the mountain there were two successive green flashes of light, like a halo (almost 1 second between them and each lasted about half a second) raising above the mountain and treelines. also, there was absolutely no sound to the whole thing, nothing.
anyway...That was about it, the whole thing lasted only a couple of seconds...Maybe 4. i remember we got very excited because we saw a meteor, got home, told parents and the next day we got up the mountain to search for it, but it was very steep and we got too tired about half the way to the top and returned home.

anyway, about the shape...You know the tear-shaped pinpoints that mark locations on google maps? that is exactly how it looked like. it didn't have a long tail or anything and the bright core was round and clearly delimited.

the colors...Outside, green (something similar to color code 02c122 or 00cc00) and with a bright-green (like bright neon-green, can't really find a color code that fits) round core in the middle. it didn't have many shades of green, overall...It was quite uniform, same color for the outer part and same color for the core)
it didn't glow very much, i mean, not like that meteor in russia that light up like the sun, it was maybe a bit brighter than the moon at night, for comparison.

this is the only weird and unexplained thing i ever witnessed. unless it was just a meteor, in which case it wasn't at all weird, but judging by the size of the thing i think it would have obliterated the entire area if it was really a meteor...Or at least make some sort of sound so...I don't know.
content.summary: Tear-shaped green object with bright-green core crashed

content.detailedDescription: I was at work looking out my window on the second floor of the building in culver city. the sky was very clear and sunny (no smog) and there were some small puffy clouds. as i looked out the window a light caught the corner of my eye. as i looked, i saw a small, starlike object that seemed to be hovering there towards the east. it was around 2:30 in the afternoon and could not be a star. i tried my hardest to keep the small object in my focus. it stayed still, hovered for a time (probably a few minutes) before the object started to move towards the south. it must have been low in altitude, because i could still see it plainly in front of the white puffy clouds it passed in front of. the clouds, i am sure, were fairly low in altitude as well. it moved slowly at first but seemed to gain speed as it moved. its movement was very slow. then, just a sudden as it started to move it stopped and hovered again. it hovered again for about a couple of minutes, then began to move in the same southerly direction at about the same speed that it was moving before. it moved slowly for about another 5 minutes before i lost sight of the object towards the south east after it passed behind some trees in the parking lot. i went outside to have a cigarette after this and looked in that general direction again but i could not find it again. my office is close to lax and we see airplanes all the time in the area, but this was not an airplane. most of the planes that fly over fly east to west or vice versa and are quite low, since they are preparing to land at nearby lax. the object, like i said flew from north to south. it had no wings nor made any sound, was low enough it passed in front of the low clouds, and appeared just like a small star. it did seem to get brighter as it moved, but when it stopped, it began to get dimmer.
content.summary: Star like object moves, then hovers, then moves again

content.detailedDescription:
Around 9:20pm my mom was out on our 2nd-floor porch and i was inside on the computer. she called me outside yelling that i had to see something. still in my slippers i rushed out and i got a glimpse of a huge light facing us that stayed in a perfectly solid sunburst-shape before it flew evenly over our porch. (the light was not flaring like when you have light glaring in your eyes. the sunburst shape was solid.) i remember feeling excited to see such a strange light and also scared at how close it was flying toward us. 
we then ran to the other end of the porch and looked back so we could see it as it flew off. we are right next to a small mountain, so it was flying just over treetop on our level, somewhere between us and well below the mountain top range. it was flying in a straight line at an even pace. from the back view you could not see that strange front light we originally saw, but it did have one small blinking light you could see in the back. that's when i noticed it was making a low whirring noise, kind of like a helicopter. but the whirring was kind of off and out of sync like maybe it had more than one propeller if it did. i could very vaguely make out the dark outline of its shape, it was long and slender. it was too small to be a helicopter, and also far too quiet as i didn't even hear it until we were at the end of the porch, and even that was faint. we watched it until it was out of sight from our angle. 
we then went back inside. i tried looking out the back window for a better view but still couldn't see it anymore. we started discussing what it could be. perhaps a drone? or surveillance ufo? there's a lot of talk around our town lately about ufo sightings and strange lights and air crafts particularly over the very mountain we are next to. perhaps this was what we saw?
content.summary: Huge solid sunburst-shaped light in front, small blinking light in back. whirring noise like multiple propellers, way too small and quiet for a helicopter.

content.detailedDescription: I went out on the patio to smoke and noticed a bright light in the sky. it looked like it was changing colors. i grabbed the binoculars and it was really clear that the lights seemed to be pulsating brightly with red, blue and green lights. i watched it for a few minutes, then went inside and got my husband to come out and look at it. he took the binoculars and saw the same thing i did except he said it appeared to be triangular in shape. (his eyesight is better than mine.) it is still hovering there now. it is a cold, clear night. it looks like it is hovering over the gulf of mexico right outside of corpus christi bay. we have seen it before but not this clearly. my husband saw a dark triangle from our living room window about a year ago. this makes me very nervous. i tried to take a picture with my phone but it was too dark.
content.summary: Was outside on patio. noticed bright light in sky that kept flashing red, blue, green. got binoculars. definitely some sort of mechanical object.

content.detailedDescription: I went out on the patio to smoke and noticed a bright light in the sky. it looked like it was changing colors. i grabbed the binoculars and it was really clear that the lights seemed to be pulsating brightly with red, blue and green lights. i watched it for a few minutes, then went inside and got my husband to come out and look at it. he took the binoculars and saw the same thing i did except he said it appeared to be triangular in shape. (his eyesight is better than mine.) it is still hovering there now. it is a cold, clear night. it looks like it is hovering over the gulf of mexico right outside of corpus christi bay. we have seen it before but not this clearly. my husband saw a dark triangle from our living room window about a year ago. this makes me very nervous. i tried to take a picture with my phone but it was too dark.
content.summary: Was outside on patio. noticed bright light in sky that kept flashing red, blue, green. got binoculars. definitely some sort of mechanical object.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving east on i-10 15 miles out of deming, nm when i first spotted it. it appeared as a white blimp like orb at first, than i stopped at a gas station and stared at it for a good 20 minutes, and it never moved an inch. hard to tell how high or far it was. i then set out on the interstate again and kept a close eye on it. i was with someone else so they drove while i observed. about 15 minutes later, after leaving the gas station, it ascended a good 500 ft or so and started moving east while slighty changing shapes. it moved along with our car, maybe 2 miles from us, and after about 8 minutes, it stopped above a mountain and stayed there until we finally lost sight by driving close to las cruces, nm. the skies were clear so it wasn't hard to notice an object standing still in the sky. i first thought it was an airplane, helicopter, or blimp. but it is impossible for any human made aircraft to stand perfectly still for that long and then suddenly start moving at 75 mph along with our car. i got excited when i first saw it, but than when it moved, i didn't expect it, so it freaked me out. i started seeing purple spots in my vision and feeling light headed in a scared way. i think that's just me though from anxiety. lost sight as we approached las cruces and the sun started falling.
content.summary: Ufo over nm mountains

content.detailedDescription: Hello every one. i have two wear sightings that i can not describe.  this first sighting i was working at lagouerce country club golf course in miami beach. in the summer months as a golf cart maintenance man. one day a big summer dark storm cloud cought my eyes over the ocean. east of were i was standing. this storm cloud that was approaching seem like it was so low that it look like it was sucking the ocean dried. very little lighting notice in the dark cloud. looking at the cloud a cigar shape dark thing or object was moving very rapidly in and out of the cloud. it will go in and in about 20 seconds will como out. no noice or lights noticed or  heard. at first i thought it was a big bird like a voucher or bigger.. but it was moving so strange in and out of the cloud in a horizontal motion for over ten minutes that i cut not pin point what it was. i showed to one of the guys that was working there and he cut not believed his eyes. we tried to discover what it was but we have never seen nothing like it. eventually the cloud arrived with the rain and that was the last i saw of it. today i still don't know what that thing or object cut it been. but it was no a bird or airplane that i have ever seen.  i figure i share with others. and ad at a little grain of sand to the idea that we are not along in the universe.
content.summary: Dark object caught my eye moving in and out of low thunder storm cloud. miami beach area 1999.

content.detailedDescription:
Note: i discussed this report briefly with georgia state director ralph howard.  he encouraged me to submit a report and offered to handle the initial interview with me should that be more convenient.  (we have already met, and i intend to become a georgia field investigator.)

the date and time of this report are approximate.  i was nineteen years old and my fellow witness was around the same age.  

in january of 1998, i was with a friend returning to ruston, louisiana, from monroe, louisiana.  it was late in the evening, but i do not recall if it was before or after midnight.  

the weather was quite cold, probably just above freezing.  as shall be discussed, we observed the sky to be very clear.  so much so that a comment on the clarity of the sky was made by my friend shortly before the observation.

here is the narrative:

my friend and i were traveling west on interstate 20 between monroe and ruston, louisiana.  approximately halfway into the trip (which usually took about thirty minutes), my friend looked up and commented on how clear the sky was.  i, who was driving, looked up and agreed.  i observed a bright white light at my eleven o'clock just above the horizon.  i do not recall the elevation, but it was quite low.  i agreed with my friend's comment about the clarity of the evening and went on to note how bright venus was.  

my friend, who is an eagle scout, looked at the light i had observed.  he disagreed with me, however, and said that the light was not venus.  having some knowledge of lights commonly in the sky, i argued that it had to be venus because of its brightness, clarity, and constancy.  

we both continued to observe the light for some minutes as we drove westward.  eventually, we both observed that the light was not staying at a relatively constant position, as a distant object would appear to do.  in other words, as the highway curved, the object was observed to change position relative to our point-of-view.  very soon, we knew that the object was much closer than a star or planet and that we would pass it.

pass it we did a few minutes later.  as we approached, the light was astonishingly bright, clear white, and utterly constant.  i slowed the car but did not stop.  here is the heart of the observation:

while driving west on i-20, my friend and i observed a large object of triangular shape hovering (or evidently hovering) just above the trees.  the object appeared dark, although i cannot say with certainty that it was black.  i can only guess that it was around fifty feet across, but it could have been far larger.  i doubt that it was much smaller.  it had a massive white light in the lower center.  that light reminded me of a xenon light.  i did not discern any blue tint to the light, as one would expect from an hmi or similar light.  at each apex, a red light was visible.  these red lights were also constant and not as bright (not nearly) as the center white light.  

we appreciated no sound, however the sounds of driving could have obscured any sounds coming from the object.  we appreciated no movement, however our movement (at a very slow rate of speed) in a westerly direction could have masked some movement.  no rotational movement was observed, nor was any change in altitude appreciated.  

after passing the object, we drove into town where we knew some friends would be.  we collected those friends and drove quickly back to the location of the sighting.  the object was gone.  

during the sighting, there were some other cars on the highway.  we did not observe any stationary cars.  we did not observe any other aircraft at the time.
content.summary: Triangle object hovered above trees immediately south of interstate 20 in north louisiana

content.detailedDescription:
We were on our back porch on the 5th of the month which my friends claimed is when we'd see ufo's. they were out in the distance as lights zipping back and forth. i then noticed on getting brighter and i started to freak out. i said that ones coming over here! that one's coming over here! i ran to my room and grabbed my shotgun (because that would help lol) and i went back out and watched as it got brighter and brighter until it became clear it was a craft. it looked to be about 40 feet long oval and 20 feet high lights all around it. it slowly floated over our house making no sound. my friends chased after it as i stayed back clutching my shotgun with the females staying with me. my friends returned after chasing it saying it just zipped off.

later we had a problem with a girl becoming possessed as well as me having to deal with greys in a spiritual form. as well as being abducted...
content.summary: We were watching lights in the south that always moved on the 5th of the month. one decided to come and it was a craft.

content.detailedDescription:
It was around april-may of 2013 early in the evening  just after supper. i went outside to the back patio to have a cigarette. it was dark out and i was watching the stars and the planes in the clear night sky. 

as i was watching one of the low flying planes heading north, a small bright blue perfect circle appeared that seamed to be ahead of and higher the plane in the lower half of the north eastern sky. of course it could have been much further than that but it's difficult to tell when looking at the sky.

the electric blue circle suddenly grew larger and had a lighter outline and a small dark centre. it grew to about the size of a quarter if i held it up against the sky. as i watched in amazement, i then saw a shooting star-like object about four times the size and way brighter than a star, fly into the centre the circle and disappear. then the circle shrank to nothing just before the plane passed by it.  it all seamed to happen in slow motion. my first thought was that it was an explosion of some kind. i didn't see the star-like object at first because the plane was blocking my view of it, so when the star-like object flew into the blue circle, it looked as if it was coming from the plane. to me it looked like the plane had shot something at the circle. 

the plane continued on it's path north and all was normal again. all i could think of was that i had witnessed something amazing but wasn't sure what it was. i thought maybe i had witnessed a supernova  but it didn't make sense. can one see a supernova with the naked eye? i did a search online to see pics of supernovas and they didn't match what i had seen. but somehow i knew it wasn't that anyway. it was way too close, too big, and too blue. 

i was so excited that i ran into the house to tell my husband what i had seen. i kept thinking about the people in the plane and wondered how they felt after seeing this. how could they miss it? i searched the internet and found reports of electric blue portals with crafts entering or exiting them. but these where blue gas-like shapes. mine was a perfect electric blue circle, crisp and clear. it was not a spiral. and it was beautiful!
content.summary: A blue circle of light grew larger. it had a small dark centre. a star-like object flew into it. it grew smaller and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
Three of us were in an old vw van on the freeway in decatur, ga.  this was as close as i can recall 1974 (40 yrs ago).  we see this ufo hovering above the freeway, maybe 200 feet above the ground if even that far.  cars and businesses were everywhere and it was perhaps 7:00 in the evening, summer, so it was very light still.  no mistaking what we saw.  it had these lights flashing rapidly, sequentially around the perimeter.  i lived on a hill back then that overlooked the freeway, so we hurried on up there, parked and ran up to the top and watched if for maybe another 30 mins.  i called the police but they just brushed me off.  while i was down at the house calling it in, my friends said it shot off into the air at break-neck speed.

we knew immediately it was a ufo.  so close you felt like you could have hit it with a baseball.  we were astonished and still speak of it to this day even though we never saw anything again after that.

note:  there were three of us in the car but hundreds of people all around there, driving.  there was a k-mart up off the exit area.

the event date above is nothing but a guess--it was 40 years ago, not even sure what month, but it was 1974.
content.summary: Peuter/silver dome-shaped disc, white lights revolving rapidly around perimeter.  just above the freeway in decatur, ga in1974.

content.detailedDescription: Tuesday evening 2/11/14. . i was in the house sitting down in front of my computer after just coming in from the backyard & settleing down for the night. as i was looking up parts for my wife 98 toyota tocoma i herd a helicopter, common for this area but the one thing that cought my attention & made it stand out/different from any other day/night was how loud it was & how low it soundeed to the house. . it gave off a very deep rumble & was really really loud. i droped what i was doing & ran outside to see what was going on & why it was flying so low. ( backyard faces west ) i ran ouside trying to avoiding my dog from running over him i saw that the ground in the backyard was lit up pretty good. i say "lit up" because it was dark out & we have a patio cover so the sky is some what blocked, as i went out the sliding back door to my right i immediately saw an orb like, star shining object that was being chased by a helicopter. . .Now the helicopter did have it's search light on so i'm gussing thats what the light was, so when i looked up i didn't even see the helicopter at first all i saw was a bright white orb then the helicopter thats how low the two were. i viewed the helicopter chasing the orb ( orb made no noise ) from the west going towards the east i started yelling ( my dog was barking ) for my wife family members ( mom,dad )& was at awww on just how low these two were in the sky & on how the orb was just so bold & solid & brillent. .It was like a star passing by right in front of me. the helicopter had it's blinking red & white lights on with the search light but when the helicopter shined the light on the orb it kept going out, or so it seemed. i viewed these two flying towards the east way off into the distance & keeped viewing for as long as i could when the orb suddenly disapered for 2/4 sec's then reappared for another 20 sec's then disapered again.
content.summary: witnessed helicopter chasing bright orb/object

content.detailedDescription: I was riding with my mother and her friend. we were on our way to church this late summer afternoon. we was on our regular way to our church,on country back roads when we noticed something in the sky burning and heading right towards us. we all was in disbelief when my moms friend stopped the car and we all jumped out of the car. the object travelling very fast descended right over the car and crashed just out of sight over the tree line about a quarter mile or less from us. whatever this was it was on fire and smoking when it flew over the car before it crashed or landed. there was never no mention of this in the news and i believe we were the only witness. i have visited the area where this happenned and would to show the world we are not alone. right after this event i saw several black helicopters around our home. i have keep this secret for to long its time for it to be known. thank you cbg
content.summary: Driving ufo crashing to earth made impact

content.detailedDescription: Just another day at work. i noticed a bright light in the eastern sky. at first i thought it was an aircraft.I drove over to the other side of the campus to get a better look.I looked up to the sky and there were four more lights behind the much larger one. to me it looked like a convoy. they were staggered a bit. they were moving ever so slow and slightly upwards. i grabbed my cellphone and was able to get a real good picture. to my surprise i was able to catch two more star like lights in the shot. i was real excited about capturing a total of seven potential saucers but by the time i was getting ready to take another picture of the light like ufos they  simply faded then vanished right before my eyes. it seems unbelievable it really does. picture tells the story. it was a beautiful sunrise that morning. i wonder where they were going. the large like saucer could of been the mothership. its silly to think that were the only life forms that exist in our universe.Note: if you zoom in on  picture the largest saucer has a white bubble shaped top and a thick green ring around dome and a flat bottom. the smaller ones you can see green also. and some of them look like a couple of ufos  side by side. so maybe ten or so.Were not alone.:-)
content.summary: It was awesome. a beautiful sunrise with 7glowing lights in formation. it was a sight to see. were not alone.              .

content.detailedDescription: Just another day at work. i noticed a bright light in the eastern sky. at first i thought it was an aircraft.I drove over to the other side of the campus to get a better look.I looked up to the sky and there were four more lights behind the much larger one. to me it looked like a convoy. they were staggered a bit. they were moving ever so slow and slightly upwards. i grabbed my cellphone and was able to get a real good picture. to my surprise i was able to catch two more star like lights in the shot. i was real excited about capturing a total of seven potential saucers but by the time i was getting ready to take another picture of the light like ufos they  simply faded then vanished right before my eyes. it seems unbelievable it really does. picture tells the story. it was a beautiful sunrise that morning. i wonder where they were going. the large like saucer could of been the mothership. its silly to think that were the only life forms that exist in our universe.Note: if you zoom in on  picture the largest saucer has a white bubble shaped top and a thick green ring around dome and a flat bottom. the smaller ones you can see green also. and some of them look like a couple of ufos  side by side. so maybe ten or so.Were not alone.:-)
content.summary: It was awesome. a beautiful sunrise with 7glowing lights in formation. it was a sight to see. were not alone.              .

content.detailedDescription: I was inside my home when my mother in law ran inside in a panic babbling about a ufo. i grabbed my camera just in case something was there. i have a veho full spectrum camera. i went out my front door, which faces north, turn right to the east and sure enough there was a huge bright ball hovering. i thought it was a helicoptwt at first- i am practical and didn't want to jump to conclusions. but then it shot upwards and started almost dancing in the sky. it was abive the treeline in the distance-it appeared to manuever in all manner of ways i have never seen any plane or helicopter do. my husband thought it was an rc copter because we heard a buzzing. he went back insidee kept hearing the noise long after the object disappeared. i determined it was actuallu a drill being used and had no bearing on what we witnessed. a neighbor was outside as well filming the whole thing. we talked about what we saw. he had a better vantagr point and confirmed it wasn't making any noise. it seems it was to far away for us to heaf anything even if it did make noise. it was far away-i had to use my zoom feature to film it and my camera kept going out of focus. i am still not certain what i filmed- i call it an ufo in the most literal sense of the term. finally it seemed to go behind some trees and disappear. the nieghbor, my mother in law, my husband, and myself are just confused but also think its kind of cool. i have never seen that before so it was hard to grasp. but i have it on camera! you can hear all of us discussing the incident-i believe my neighbor called the police too. my computer does not work so i cannot upload video until i get to a friend's home.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright crazy moving orb

content.detailedDescription:
Was watching the news when i overheard a loud helicopter thundering over my house, i got up and ran to my south window where i saw a black military attack helicopter hauling ass just over my house at or below 300 feet from my roof top.

it was going east to west then immediately turned south towards a thin dark grey disk object that had a white light modulating from it.

the disk appeared less than a mile away heading north when it was as if the helicopter spooked it and it simply made an abrupt left turn heading northwest at an amazing speed towards kansas city, missouri.

with the black military attack helicopter turning very hard "almost vertical" around heading northwest in pursuit of it.

what ever the object was, it definitely had the ability to out run the military helicopter and disappeared from sight.
content.summary: Ufo chased by military attack helicopter near lone jack mo

content.detailedDescription:
In a small populated area of teresopolis, rio de janeiro, near to dense vegetation, while shooting pictures of the sky (basically beautiful clouds that were in the same direction of the son), in the afternoon, i was surprised by the image of an unknown solid object , which left a trail.
i did not see it at the shooting time, only when i opened the photos in adobe a little while later.
i was shooting at 1/1000s f/16, 28mm lense, with a canon 70d.
it was the 27 of january 2014, 17:42hs. my wife was also there.
it seems to be making a descent course, and there seems to be a trail.
i would be very grateful if muffon could check what this might be.
as a professioanl photographer it seems to me i captured an unknown solid object,entirely different from the the sun reflexions also present in the shot.
if there any interest from muffon i may provide the original  raw archive of the shot.
thank you.
content.summary: Bluish solid like sphere with trail captured in raw file while shooting cloud

content.detailedDescription:
On oct. 2nd around 6 am i went outside to my truck to have a smoke and after sitting in my truck and resting my head against the door pillar i looked up and saw a glowing light moving all around turning red to green to white. i keep my head pressed against the door as not to allow my head from moving so i could confirm that it was the light moving and not my head. i got out of my truck and watched the light moving in all different directions. the first picture i took had the flash on and since it was still dark outside it showed a white(ish) ball with an attached tail (or a streak). the 2nd picture i took (with no flash) showed a purple glowing ball (at no time did i ever see the ball turn purple with my eyes). i watched this go on for about 15 mins. i went inside to wake another family member and when i returned outside it was gone.

on another note, i observed a glowing orange ball almost in the same spot almost 30 years ago. this sighting was witnessed by countless others (inc my grandparents 40 miles away) and even the news reported that a local airforce base had sent fighter jets to investigate.

i would also like to mention that i have video of other non-conventional aircrafts in the same area (although i do believe these to be man made) that i have never seen again.
content.summary: Glowing light changing red to green to white(ish) moving up, down, left, and right with no pattern

content.detailedDescription:
My mother and i were returning home from a family members house and i was in the passenger seat of the car. i looked up and saw a large glowing red object in the sky. the sky was clear and there were no clouds, airplanes, or helicopters in the area. it was apparent that it was not a star due to the size and brightness. the object was stationary and slowly changed color from red to a lava-like red-orange and back to red again twice before my mother stopped the car and i jumped out into the street to attempt to take a photo. once i got out it seemed that the lights from the car down the street(who was at the mailbox) and the streetlight made it harder for me to get a decent shot without glare, but i tried anyway. i snapped a few photos and then it dimmed and disappeared, as if it was traveling very fast straight backwards. 
my mother and father had seen a couple of these objects a few nights prior(she also reported them on here) hovering over a lake in the same area. 
the photos i am attaching are the best shot i got of the object, and then the object once we were able to blow it up on the computer at home.
content.summary: Glowing red orange orb changing color very bright much larger than a star

content.detailedDescription: I was heading to the grocery store to do some quick shopping. my friend was driving, as we pulled out of the driveway i noticed a jumbo jet flying low and slow in the sky. i thought the speed of the plane was odd and that's when i noticed the object in front of the plane. at first i thought it might be a bird until i noticed it wasn't moving. the object looked like a dark, short line. similar to a coin laying flat. it was much smaller than the plane, or possible further away, as i could make out the details of the jet easily (wings, engines, etc). the object was too small, or far away, to see any details. it had no discernible lighting of any kind. it just looked like a dark line. despite the craft's size it was still clearly visible as there was nothing else in the sky besides the plane. i continued to watch it as we drove out to the main road. as the plane moved past the object, the object then rose upward from the position it had been hovering in to follow the plane. it was as if the object was moving out of the flight path of the plane when it rose upwards before following. i lost track of both the plane and object as we turned onto the main road. it was surprising but exciting as well. i have an interest paranormal and unexplained things but i don't immediately jump to that conclusion when i see something strange. this isn't my first experience seeing a ufo but the first in this state. living near a major airport, i see numerous planes flying around all the time but nothing like this. unfortunately my friend didn't see it as he was driving but i was describing it to him as i watched. i only wish i could've got video and/or pics.
content.summary: Ufo follows plane

content.detailedDescription:
I was sleeping at the time   heard a object hover for awhile maybe five min  a bit later heard what i think was a helicopter or low flying plane  i never got up  was to tired.  wish i had. about two weeks later i was outback with my landscaper  i mentioned this root i was standing on and not remembering it being there   he brought to my attention that it wasn't a root an in fact was part of a circle that has formed  when i stepped back  i was floored.  there was a circle with burnt out grass in the center. this is when i put two and two together  because its rt out my bedroom window   to be clear i never saw the the object but did hear it   so in ur questioare i could not answer some of the questions 
   photos were taken a couple weeks later  on depicts the edge and depth of indentation 
the pic with the wholes in ground appear to be some type of stabilization probe  just guessing 
the other pic shows the circle  i will tag grass samples and save i case u are interested
content.summary: Heard a hovering sound out bedroom window two week later noticed a perfect circle about five foot radius ten foot across  with burnt grass in center

content.detailedDescription: I was out on the deck, overlooking the water looking northeast across the straight of georgia when a bright light in the clouds  flickered on.  it stayed on for approximately 5 minutes, stopped for five minutes then flickered back on.  while this was going on a smaller craft was flying across the  straight of georgia, east to west.  as it approached the larger object the smaller crafts lights(2 or 3) would fade out and as it flew away from the larger object, the smaller craft would light up again.  attached is a blurry video which could possibly determine the size of the object, i could not make out the smaller craft in the video.
content.summary: Weekend getaway and observed a very bright large object and smaller object.

content.detailedDescription: Woke up at 0345 to get a glass of water...Looked out the window and just above the telephone pole was this round white lighted object....I watched it for twenty -thirty minutes ...Went back to my chair and then got up again to see if it was still there...This time it was at same location but lighs were glittering in this circular object like diamonds glittering...I continued to watch until 0500...The lat.43.480.....Long-70.456....There were no stars in the sky and it was overcast..At 0500 i went back to my chair to sleep and when i did ...The object was still there hovering and glittering like a diamonds in bright white sparkler type lights...This object was a perfect circular object...I wanted to wake up my son and even went to his door to tell him but he was sleeping so good that i did not wake him...After telling my son about it....He told me that on oct 13,2013@0300 a ufo was seen in the exactspot in biddeford,maine....I feel it should be reported because it was seen twice now within 3 month period...This sighting should be looked into...
content.summary: It was round,it hoverd for one hour first 20 minutes was just a round white light...Then the lights glittered for the remainder of the hour like diamonds glittering
